Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Apartaments MS Alay in Benalmadena (Benalmadena Costa), you'll be minutes from Sea-Life and Benalmadena Marina. This apartment is within close proximity of El Saltillo Beach and Bil-Bil Castle.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 62 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves. Rooms have private balconies. Flat-screen televisions are provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and coffee/tea makers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a garden. This apartment also features complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the apartment's restaurant, where you can take in a pool view. Snacks are also available at a coffee shop/café. While enjoying a refreshing dip in the apartment pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. A roundtrip airport shuttle is available for a surcharge.


Pets not allowed Check-out time is Noon
Satisfy your appetite at the apartment's restaurant, where you can take in a pool view. Snacks are also available at a coffee shop/café. While enjoying a refreshing dip in the apartment pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

With a stay at Apartaments MS Alay in Benalmadena (Benalmadena Costa), you'll be minutes from Sea-Life and Benalmadena Marina. This apartment is within close proximity of El Saltillo Beach and Bil-Bil Castle.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Sea-Life - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Benalmadena Marina - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
El Saltillo Beach - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Bil-Bil Castle - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Paloma Park - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Selwo Marina - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
La Carihuela - 1.5 km / 1 mi
La Bateria Park - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Benalmadena Cable Car - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Tivoli World - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Plaza de Toros Torremolinos - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Torremolinos Synagogue - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Crocodile Park - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Aqualand Torremolinos - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Torrequebrada Golf Club - 3.2 km / 2 mi

The preferred airport for Apartaments MS Alay is Malaga (AGP) - 8.9 km / 5.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
